column8:
The Huey. A great workhorse, a troop carrier & gunship made famous by the conflict in Vietnam. Officially named the UH-1, it was actually called the HU-1 originally, hence the nickname "Huey".

It first flew in 1956, and still serves on the front-line for many different national military unit's. It has also been featured in many war movies, including Apocalypse Now and Platoon, as well as in numerous action adventure films.
